votebox.middle.view.widget

Class AToggleButtonState

  • java.lang.Object
    • votebox.middle.view.widget.AToggleButtonState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultToggleButtonState, FocusedSelectedToggleButtonState, FocusedToggleButtonState, SelectedToggleButtonState

    public abstract class AToggleButtonState
extends java.lang.Object
    This class deifnes the abstract state for a ToggleButton (used in state pattern). ToggleButtons delegate certain state-dependent behaviors to an instance of this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AToggleButtonState() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void focus(ToggleButton context)
      The SelectableCardElement delegates to this method when it is told that the user is currently focused on it.
      abstract IViewImage getImage(ToggleButton context)
      Because the image that is used to represent a toggle button is state-speciffic, getImage is delegated here.
      abstract void makeDeselected(ToggleButton context)
      Explicitly deselects the element who delegates to this state object.
      abstract void makeSelected(ToggleButton context)
      Explicitly selects the element who delegates to this state object.
      abstract void select(ToggleButton context)
      The SelectableCardElement delegates to this method when it is told that the user has chosen it to be toggled.
      abstract void unfocus(ToggleButton context)
      The SelectableCardElement delegates to this method when it is told that the user is no longer focused on it.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • AToggleButtonState

        public AToggleButtonState()

    • Method Detail

      • getImage

        public abstract IViewImage getImage(ToggleButton context)
        Because the image that is used to represent a toggle button is state-speciffic, getImage is delegated here.
        Parameters:
        context - This is the button that is delegating.
        Returns:
        This method returns the state-specific image that represents the delegating button.

      • select

        public abstract void select(ToggleButton context)
        The SelectableCardElement delegates to this method when it is told that the user has chosen it to be toggled.
        Parameters:
        context - This is the button that is delegating.

      • makeSelected

        public abstract void makeSelected(ToggleButton context)
        Explicitly selects the element who delegates to this state object. This will happen regardless of the current state.
        Parameters:
        context - This is the button that is delegating.

      • makeDeselected

        public abstract void makeDeselected(ToggleButton context)
        Explicitly deselects the element who delegates to this state object. Thi swill happen regardless of the current state.
        Parameters:
        context - This is the button that is delegating.

      • focus

        public abstract void focus(ToggleButton context)
        The SelectableCardElement delegates to this method when it is told that the user is currently focused on it.
        Parameters:
        context - This is the button that is delegating.

      • unfocus

        public abstract void unfocus(ToggleButton context)
        The SelectableCardElement delegates to this method when it is told that the user is no longer focused on it.
        Parameters:
        context - This is the button that is delegating.
